front.title: IANA Assignment of DSCP Pool 3 (xxxx01) Values to require Publication of a Standards Track or Best Current Practice RFC

abstract.t: The Differentiated Services (Diffserv) architecture specifies use of the field in the IPv4 and IPv6 packet header to carry the Diffserv Code point (DSCP). The Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) maintains a registry of assigned DSCP values. This update to RFC2474 changes the IANA assignment method for Pool 3 of the registry (i.e., DSCP's of the form xxxx01) to Standards Action, i.e., values are assigned through a Standards Track or Best Current Practice RFC. The update also removes permission for experimental and Local Use of the code points that form Pool 3 of the DSCP registry; Pool 1 code points (i.e., DEC's of the form xxxx11) remain available for these purposes.
